content:
That's great to hear! Codenames is an excellent game for introducing people to the world of modern board games. It's easy to learn, but has a lot of depth and replayability.

It's awesome that Rachel enjoyed it! Codenames is a great game for teams and encourages creative thinking, deduction, and strategic planning. Did you find that you and Rachel worked well together, or was there a lot of laughter and miscommunication?

Have you played Codenames with Rachel again since then, or are you planning to introduce her to other games?
